main.changelog:
DO NOT UPDATE PLUGIN FROM UPDATER
Main release changelog:General Updates:
Various UI tweaks and improvements.
Version updates for Pedal, Bridge, and Plugin.
Added support for V5 board in OTA, WebFlasher and build package.
Improved KF filter calculation and added a second KF filter for joystick output.
Updated DAP version incrementally from 142 to 145.
Added error code logging and improved payload handling.
Major refactoring of the plugin code by separating UserControl into different files.

Pedal
Added a warning for failed pedal assignment checks.
Removed CDC serial support for the V4 board. V4 users must now connect both USB-C ports for serial and HID access.
Hardware assignment now overrides software assignment.
Adjusted rudder behavior: it now moves more slowly during initialization and de-initialization.
Added a "boot into download system" action for V4/V5 boards (not available for Gilphilbert V1.2).
ABS/TC effects now activate only when the pedal is pressed.
ABS frequency adjustment now depends on surface conditions (currently iRacing and ACC only, AC EVO support planned).
Added version output in the DAP_basic_state package.
Added payload type, DAP version, and CRC check for rudder and joystick output to reduce jitter.
Fixed an issue where error codes were not displayed correctly.
Fixed an OTA page visibility bug when enabled from serial on ESP32 boards.
Reverted the servo special register setting.

Bridge
Incremental version updates alongside Pedal.
Added payload type, DAP version, and CRC check for rudder package.
Added bridge version output.

Plugin
Add community config sharing button.
Added preview feature to community config.
Converted single sliders and labels into UI elements.
Fixed a CRC error bug in the new pedal configuration.
Fixed a version parsing issue for SimHub Beta.
Added surface condition detection for ABS frequency adjustment (for iRacing and ACC).
Introduced a live preview function: configurations can be sent to the pedal without saving them to storage when making any config variable change. To save, click "Save to Pedal."
Removed "set DTR/RTS false" option.
Plugin now displays the pedal and bridge firmware versions.
Added servo load calculation; warnings now appear if max force is likely to exceed servo capacity.
11 Error codes are now logged in the SimHub log.
12 Added a checkbox and slider for joystick output denoise filtering.

Rudder
During initialization, configurations are stored in RAM instead of pedal storage (they will not persist after a restart).
Added RPM effect for DCS.

Known Issues
The rudder does not automatically center on initialization; a manual push is required.

dev-build.changelog:
Dev build changelog:
Pedal
1. Servo Idle Protection
- Enabled on all boards except Gilphilbert PCBA v2. This is handled in software by disabling coil engagement.
- On Gilphilbert, servo idle protection is managed by hardware.
- For Gilphilbert PCBA v1.2 users:
  - The LED turns red when idle.
  - If a buzzer is attached, it will beep.
  - Set the servo idle timeout value to greater than 0 to enable this feature.
2. TX Power Adjustment
- Reduced TX power back to 8.5 dBm for Gilphilbert PCBA v1.2 users.
3. Version Updates
- DAP updated to version 149
- Firmware updated to version 0.90.06

Bridge
1. HID Timeout Fix
- Fixed an issue where the HID timeout was set to 0.
2. External Joystick (RP2040 Example)
- Serial baud rate changed to 921600.

- Firmware updated to version 0.90.06

daily-build.changelog:
Daily build changelog:
KF (Kalman Filter) Improvements
For users running PID control, we now recommend the following updated values:
P = 0.01
I = 1.0
D = 0.0002

Rudder Filter Updates
Rudder movement filter has been updated to use a Kalman filter.
Rudder force reading filter has been switched to an exponential filter.

Force Reading Outlier Detection
The system now automatically detects and ignores outliers in force readings to maintain accuracy.

Loadcell Output in Kilograms
Loadcell shifting and variance are now reported in kg for clearer interpretation.

Plugin updater
Now you can update the plugin with one click.
